definition: to invite/to request/to intercept/to solicit/to seek
to walk (side part of split character)
invitation tournament (e.g. between schools or firms)
to invite a group of people (to assemble for a gathering)
to take the credit for sb's achievement
to buy popular support/to court favor

sentences.english: Trevor, make him invite you to a sleepover. During the sleepover
sentences.chinese: 特雷福，你想办法让莱昂内尔邀你在他家过夜。

sentences.english: Next time somebody asks for a radio interview, I’ll do better.
sentences.chinese: 下次有人邀我做电台访问的时候，我会做得更好些。

sentences.english: May the moon bear witness that the moonlit love is but perfection.
sentences.chinese: 邀明月，爱在月光下完美。

sentences.english: Mr. Blare was invited to be in charge of lightening of stage.
sentences.chinese: 布莱尔先生被邀负责舞台的灯光设计。

sentences.english: A: I’d like to invite you to dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我想邀您一起共进晚餐。

sentences.english: She stood up with many men in the ball.
sentences.chinese: 在舞会上，许多男士都邀她共舞。

sentences.english: Lee chicken with millet, invited me to Tian.
sentences.chinese: 故人具鸡黍，邀我至田家。

sentences.english: We'd like to invite you to lunch.
Abbot see this old instrument out of the ordinary, they invited him to To the temple to drink tea.
sentences.chinese: 方丈见这老人仪表不凡，便邀他到寺里喝茶。

sentences.english: I pretended to be a 4） middle-aged man and ended up 5）asking a 16-year-old girl out.
sentences.chinese: 我装成一个中年男人，最后邀一个十六岁女孩出来。

sentences.english: Can I take you to lunch?
sentences.chinese: 我可以邀你共进午餐吗？

sentences.english: I've been cordially invited to join the visceral realists.
sentences.chinese: 他们盛情邀我加入本能现实主义派。

sentences.english: I pretended to be a 4) middle-aged man and ended up 5)asking a 16-year-old girl out.
sentences.chinese: 我装成一个中年男人，非常后邀一个十六岁女孩出来。

sentences.english: Deeply touched, she invited Shoun to visit her the next evening and play. He accepted the invitation.
sentences.chinese: 她邀正安次夜到她的下处为她演奏，他接受了邀请。

sentences.english: And he invited me to participate in the festival here in Ikebukuro.
sentences.chinese: 他又会邀我一起渡过池袋这儿的节目。

sentences.english: Then I was invited to attend the fashion weeks in Paris and Milan.
sentences.chinese: 之后我就被邀参加巴黎和米兰时装周了。

definition: to agree (on a meeting place, date etc)/to reach agreement/to make an appointment
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate
variant of 嘉賓|嘉宾[jia1 bin1]
to recommend sb/to give a referral
